tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor was very good and very sweet . She explained very properly & clearly . Would definitely recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Care of women with repeated miscarriage,
review:
I m short of words and not sure where to start. It was after meeting Jayasree mam, we understood the meaning of saying "Doctors are God". I had gone through recurrent miscarraiges in past, and have visited several big/expert doctors but never ever felt the way I did after meeting Jayasree mam. Bcoz we had gone through lot in past, we have slowly gained good understanding of things related to pregnancy and on the first meeting with Jayashree mam, ** **** ** **** ******* ***** *** **** ******* *** ** ************** caring and someone we can fully trust. Also Because of recurrent miscarriages I had lost all hope and had decided that it was my last attempt. 
It was only and only because of her I got the inner strength and finally delivered a baby boy. Every meeting with her was exceptional, not only was she able to diagnose everything perfectly because of her experience, it also boosted my confidence and made me stronger from inside. I could always feel that this time it's going to be all good. On the delivery date as well, I was admant for a Csection but Mam didn't lose hope , she said no matter what I won't do csection as there is no need since both mother and child are perfectly fine. She held my hand, served me juice and gave me motivation regularly. Then after 2-3 hours of pain which is good thing as it helps in pushing baby down , she gave epidural and my labor pain vanished temporarily , which helped a lot as I was able to apply force without feeling pain and got courage and comfort for normal delivery.
Not sure how to put the whole experience in words but It was only because of her I finally delivered a Baby boy normally. May God always keep her healthy and young. *** ** *** **** ****** * **** *** **** ***** Don't think twice, just meet her once.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Gynae Problems,Maternal Care/ Checkup,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review:
****** *********** *** *** **** **** * i am visiting since last 7 8 month . always try to  normal delivery even in critical condition. and other team member like dr  meenakshi  and dr mattery all are very good and honest , and fetal medicine dr chanchal is also very good and humble. in one place you can get best team. I visited after apollo just for case of single umbilical cord case 
She always motivated me that everything will be fine now we get one baby girl with normal delivery .
Thanks all team

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** * **** **** **** ******* Her way of handling patients is extremely calming for the patients and with such a positive attitude, it helps alot.  My entire journey from conception till delivery (which in my case was NOT a piece of cake) was handled beautifully and carefully by the doctor. I highly recommend Dr. Jayasree for all Gynea related issues and Pregnancy checkups.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Jayasree Sundar is very polite and very soft spoken and she discribe the things in very detail. She explain very satisfactory. My younger son was delivered by her. She has very good hands for care. My experience was very good. My sister  ( Nitika Srivastava) also visit to her. She is also fully satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Sunder in Jan 2021 for pregnancy check up. In the very first meeting she ensured me about healthy and normal delivery..and she guided me very well in my pregnancy regarding medicines and exercises. She is the best gynaecologist i've ever met. On 22 sep i delivered a baby girl at Birthright Hospital normally under supervision of Dr. Sunder. I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: This was my first-time visit to Dr. Jayashree. She is indeed a Superb doctor, very patient and calm. Infused a lot of positivity and encouraged to look forward to a normal delivery. I am very happy with my experience of visiting and consulting her and so glad to have found such a brilliant gynaecologist for all my future visits henceforth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
* ********* ******, not only she resolved my medical issue perfectly, she also saved me from a surgery which was recommended to me by previous doctor. The technical expertise she has and the  sincere effort that she puts in is amazing.  
Thanks a lot ma'am
